overview: A couple finds a vintage black & white film in the attic of the home that they just moved into. When they press play, they're propelled back in time to when the film was being filmed, and it's a drab place; there is no color, the people are sexually repressed, and they see no way of escape. With the sexual guidance of the couple, however, the small town begins to glisten with color-- big tits and warm, inviting pussies included!
title: Pleasureville: A DP XXX Parody
